Title: Relates to videoconferencing meetings under the open meetings law
Summary: Establishes under the open meetings law any member or officer of the public body that uses videoconferencing to participate in a meeting shall be counted for quorum; requires a site be provided to the public to participate in such videoconferencing.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to videoconferencing meetings under the open meetings law
